title: Uniform bounded elementary generation of Chevalley groups
abstract: In this paper we establish a definitive result which almost completely closes the problem of bounded elementary generation for Chevalley groups of rank $\ge 2$ over arbitrary Dedekind rings $R$ of arithmetic type, with uniform bounds. Namely, we show that for every reduced irreducible root system $Φ$ of rank $\ge 2$ there exists a universal bound $L=L(Φ)$ such that the simply connected Chevalley groups $G(Φ,R)$ have elementary width $\le L$ for all Dedekind rings of arithmetic type $R$.
